ngiemboon: Yɔɔn ŋwàʼne fóo mbwó mèŋ Pɔ̂ɔ, ngàŋntúm Yěsô Keleto, mbà pʉ̀a mesoŋ zɔ̌ la te wɔ́ɔn tsɔ́ʼ, atsɔ̌ nyìŋ mesoŋ zɔ̌ ké te wɔ́ɔn túm. Yěsô Keleto pɔ́ Ssé Tá zɔ̌ la túmo wɔ́ɔn. Yé Tá la gÿo Yěsô zíme na legwé.
en: Paul,   an apostle #— #not from men or by man, but by Jesus Christ and God the Father  # 1:1 Mt 5:16; 6:1; 11:27; Jn 8:42 who raised him from the dead  # 1:1 Ac 9:6; 20:24; 22:10–21; 26:16  #— #

ngiemboon: Peg lâ mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌ pie peg lâ pɔ̌ ee jʉʼɔɔn pǔ ńnáa yɔɔn ŋwàʼne á mbwó mecúʼtè pʉ̀a Keleto mie ée tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Ngalasia.
en: and all the brothers who are with me:

ngiemboon: Peg ne ńtsɔ́ɔn ngie Tá wege Ssé mbɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô Keleto ne ńcÿó gʉm gí, ńne ńnéŋe mbʉ́lè na pi!
en: Grace to you and peace from God the Father and our Lord   Jesus Christ,

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńzsé ngie Keleto yé máŋwɛ́ la náa twó yé, ńtí menò tepòŋ mégè lélɔg sẅɛʼ ndòon yege, púʼu léfó mbwó yɔɔn kème njÿó gie á té poŋ, ńkẅile wégè. Mɔɔn menò gwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ Tá wege Ssé la záb.
en: who gave himself for our sins   to rescue us from this present evil age,  # 1:4 Mt 20:28; Rm 4:25; 1Co 15:3; Gl 2:20 according to the will of our God and Father.  # 1:4 Php 4:20; 1Th 1:3; 3:11,13; Heb 10:7; 1Pt 3:17; Rv 10:7

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a mesoŋ guʼte Ssé mengùʼu mengùʼ! Áa púʼu!
en: To him be the glory forever and ever. Amen.

ngiemboon: Á pǔ ńkʉʼʉ wɔ́ɔn tɛʼ na páʼ Ssé ka cʉa na Keleto, ńtóŋo gẅí, ńcÿó gʉm gí, n ka leen ńkẅɛɛ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, pi sele nzèm yé, tà ńcʉ́ʼʉ ńjúʼu pɔ́ tsɔ́ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo we ndyɛ̀ʼɛ.
en: I am amazed that you are so quickly turning away from him who called   you by the grace of Christ and are turning to a different gospel #— #

ngiemboon: N těen ńdɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie etsɔ́ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo gíŋ ńgwɔ́ wó wɔ́, etsɔ́ pʉ̀a zɔ̌ɔ ssé ńne ḿbue twó gí, ńne faʼa lékúbe nkʉ̀ mbòŋo Keleto.
en: not that there is another gospel,   but there are some  # 1:7 Jd 4 who are troubling you and want to distort the gospel of Christ.

ngiemboon: Peg kéen ńdáʼ ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo mbwó pi. Tà tsɔ̌ nyìŋ lɔɔn ḿbiŋ ńtó fʉ̀ʼɔɔn, kà à gwɔ́ pɔ́ nyìŋ weg wɔ́ɔ, kà pɔ́ Cÿɔ́ʼ Ssé, éfóo tÿǒ lepwó wɔ́ɔ, ńtsẅi tsɔ́ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo wendyɛ̀ʼɛ mbwó pi, tà é té gwɔ́ pɔ́ gẅie peg ka tsẅi wɔ́, mbà á zɛ́te ngie Ssé néŋ ndòon twó ngàŋ.
en: But even if we or an angel   from heaven should preach to you a gospel contrary to what we have preached to you,  # 1:8 Rm 15:20 a curse be on him!  # 1:8 Or you, let him be condemned, or you, let him be condemned to hell; Gk anathema

ngiemboon: Peg ka zɔɔn ńgɔɔn né pi. N gee fʉ̀ʼɔɔn ńgíŋe ńkímte kimté ngie, nyìŋ lɔɔn ńtó ńtsẅi tsɔ́ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo wendyɛ̀ʼɛ mbwó pi, tà é té gwɔ́ pɔ́ gẅie peg ka tsẅi wɔ́, mbà á zɛ́te ngie e Ssé néŋ ndòon twó ngàŋ.
en: As we have said before, I now say again: If anyone is preaching to you a gospel contrary to what you received,   a curse be on him!

ngiemboon: Pi shwóŋo wɔ́ɔn, anò gie mèŋ fóo légɔɔn lɔɔn, á nyɛɛ ngie n ne ńtsɔ́ɔn ngie nò yɔ́ɔn poŋ pʉ̀a mesoŋ kà ngie à poŋ pɔ́ Ssé? N gee páʼa ńne ńtsɔ́ɔn légÿo mmó gie á ge poŋ pʉ̀a mesoŋ ka? Á gwéʼe péʼe, n ne faʼa mbɔɔ légÿo mmó gie á poŋ pʉ̀a mesoŋ, mbà n te gíŋ ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ gẅie à kwaʼa faʼa fàʼa Keleto wɔ́.
en: For am I now trying to persuade people,   or God?  # 1:10 1Th 2:4 Or am I striving to please people? If I were still trying to please people, I would not be a servant of Christ.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, tà mèŋ shwóŋo gẅí, nkʉ̀ mbòŋo gẅie pi la júʼ n tsẅi, é té nkwaŋá nyìŋ mesoŋ wɔ́.
en: For I want you to know, brothers and sisters, that the gospel preached by me is not of human origin.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ mesoŋ zɔ la zɔɔn te cʉ́me wɛ̌ nkʉ̀ mbwó mèŋ wɔ́. Nyìŋ mesoŋ ké te wɔ́ɔn zíʼi, Yěsô Keleto zɔ la gÿo n zsé.
en: For I did not receive it from a human source and I was not taught it, but it came by a revelation   of Jesus Christ.  # 1:12 1Co 11:23; 15:3

ngiemboon: Kwàʼ pi la zɔɔn ńjúʼ páʼ n dɔ̌ɔn ńgÿo púʼu, á fʉ̀ʼ gie n da nyé ńguʼte Ssé na ntí ye pà Yúndà. Pi ne ńzsé ntí gie n dɔ̌ɔn ńdɔgɔ sáʼa tʉ̀ ńtsɔ́ʼɔ kwò cúʼtè pʉ̀a Ssé té poŋ ḿbiŋe faʼa lépú ḿbyág púʼu.
en: For you have heard about my former way of life   in Judaism:  # 1:13 Ac 8:1–9:2; 26:4; Php 3:5–6 I intensely persecuted  # 1:13 Php 3:6; 2Tm 3:12 God’s church and tried to destroy it.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa na leguʼte Ssé na ntí ye pà Yúndà, mbà n daa mǒ tà ḿbú ńcʉa kwò nkàŋ yég púɔ pà Yúndà. N dɔ̌ɔn ḿbúu ḿmaʼa mbùm yɔ̀ɔn tɛʼ na tsẅé láʼ, ńcʉa wɔ́b.
en: I advanced in Judaism beyond many contemporaries among my people, because I was extremely zealous for the traditions of my ancestors.

ngiemboon: Káʼa mbà n da nyé pɔ́ lepfòm, e Ssé tsɔ́ʼɔ wɔ́ɔn, ńgÿo ńcÿó gʉm yɔ́ɔn, ńtóŋo wɔ́ɔn ngie n cʉ́ʼ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ na mé mbwó.
en: But when God, who from my mother’s womb set me apart and called   me by his grace, was pleased

ngiemboon: À la piŋ ńnéŋe tà ńgyá ngie à ge gÿo n zsé Míŋ we, légwɔ́ gie n ge gʉa tsẅi nkʉ̀ gẅie é líe Míŋ we ŋwɛ́, á mbwó pʉ̀a pie é té pà Yúndà wɔ́. N gyá Míŋ we ŋwɛ́, n te gwóon ḿbíge tsɔ̌ nyìŋ tsɔ́ nò wɔ́.
en: to reveal his Son   in me, so that I could preach him among the Gentiles, I did not immediately consult with anyone.  # 1:16 Lit flesh and blood

ngiemboon: N ké te pʉʉ Yelúzálèm, ńgyá pʉ̀a pie é la vɔg ńgwɔ́ megàŋntúm Yěsô tá n tó yɔ́ɔn mɔ́; tà ńcʉ́ʼ púʼu, mbà n da gwóon ńgʉa né Alabi, ńgÿo ńgíŋ ḿbiŋe tÿǒsoŋ Ndamásè.
en: I did not go up to Jerusalem   to those who had become apostles  # 1:17 Jd 17 before me; instead I went to Arabia  # 1:17 Is 21:13; Jr 25:24; Ezk 27:21; Gl 4:25 and came back to Damascus.  # 1:17 2Sm 8:5

ngiemboon: N da láʼ ńgwaa pʉʉ Yelúzálèm légʉa ńgyá Piɛ peg yé zséte, mbà é cʉ̌a ngùʼ tá. N kúu wó, peg yé néŋe lyɛ̌ʼ ntsɔ̀b tʉ̂a né legém.
en: Then after three years I did go up to Jerusalem   to get to know Cephas,  # 1:18 Other mss read Peter,# 1:18 Jn 1:42 and I stayed with him fifteen days.

ngiemboon: É té ndàʼ yé wɔ́, mbà n da te gíŋ ńgyá tsɔ̌ ngàŋntúm Yěsô wendyɛ̀ʼɛ wɔ́, n da gíŋ ńgyá pɔ́ Jÿâg fɛ̌ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: But I didn’t see any of the other apostles except James,   the Lord’s brother.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie n ŋweʼe éshwóŋo gẅí lɔɔn, áa nénʉ́. N tyě páʼɔɔn mvfò Ssé, ńne ńgɔɔn ngie n těen ńcÿɔɔ nò wɔ́.
en: I declare in the sight of God: I am not lying in what I write to you.

ngiemboon: N da pɔ́ɔnte, ńgʉa tsɛ̀ɛ meláʼ ngwòŋ Sili mbɔɔ tsɛ̀ɛ me Silisi,
en: Afterward, I went to the regions of Syria   and Cilicia.  # 1:21 Ac 9:30; 11:25–26

ngiemboon: ńgwaa ne gwaa giŋe faʼa púʼu, mbà pʉ̀a Keleto pie ée Jẅindê laa zí shÿó wɔ̀ɔn gyá.
en: I remained personally unknown to the Judean churches that are in Christ.

ngiemboon: Á la gwaa gwɔ́, mbà pɔ́ la júʼ pɔ́ páʼ mé ne ńgɔɔn ngie: «Nyìŋ gẅie à laa tsɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ ńne ńtsɔ́ʼɔ kwò yɔ́b té poŋ la, aa fʉ̀ʼɔɔn ńne ńtsẅii nkʉ̀ mbòŋo, ńgɔɔn nò na lezǎb ntʉ́m na Yěsô gẅie à laa tsɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ, ésáʼa tʉ̀ pɔ́ lépyág la.»
en: They simply kept hearing, “He who formerly persecuted   us now preaches the faith  # 1:23 Jd 3 he once tried to destroy.”

ngiemboon: Á cʉa púʼu, pɔ́ ne ńguʼte Ssé ńtí wɔ́ɔn.
en: And they glorified God because of me.
